sec.p: There was a slight tendency for the relationship between March temperature and timing of initiation to become weaker over time, and for the relationship between April temperature and timing of termination to become stronger over time, but neither of these trends were significant (2-way ANOVA comparing additive ‘ temperature + year’ with interactive ‘ temperature × year’ models: Initiation: F 1 = 0.172, SS = 2.00, P = 0.69; Termination: F 1 = 0.002, SS = 0.017, P = 0.97).
